summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated April 11, 2021, transmitting draft notes (attached as '2021-04-09 _notes.doex') for review and discussion. The document appears to be internal government correspondence related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email transmitting draft notes for review and discussion.

events.title: Email transmitting draft notes
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email with attached draft notes, requesting a call to discuss them.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 11, 2021, from an Assistant United States Attorney.
The email transmits an attachment titled '2021-04-09 _notes.doex', which are draft notes.
The sender offers to discuss the attached notes via phone call.
The correspondence originates from the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating ongoing legal work related to the Epstein case in 2021.
